attributes.action: stop lying to the electorate to maintain his position.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: within 24 hours of declaring that he will now promote open and transparent government he has withheld an inquiry report because it proves that one of his ministers' is a thief, fraudster and a liar.  this is proof, if any was needed, that Gordon Brown is fundamentally incapable of being IN THE SLIGHTEST bit honest in what he tells the electorate.
